argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_equsb3lem | |- ( [ w / y ] y = z <-> w = z ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_sbbii | |- ( [ x / w ] [ w / y ] y = z <-> [ x / w ] w = z ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ w y = z |
| 4 | 3 | #P_sbco2 | |- ( [ x / w ] [ w / y ] y = z <-> [ x / y ] y = z ) |
| 5 |  | #P_equsb3lem | |- ( [ x / w ] w = z <-> x = z ) |
| 6 | 2, 4, 5 | #P_3bitr3i | |- ( [ x / y ] y = z <-> x = z ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ eqsb3 , shorter but requiring ~ ax-11 . (Contributed by Raph Levien and FL, 4-Dec-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
